title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item is not selected on the first attempt.

OB: -

EB: The second time I select the item, it can be selected without any issues.

SR: 1. Add a label in the library file.
2. Select the label item in the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select another item in the library outline view and observe that it is not selected on the first attempt.
